author: Joseph Green
title: McAfee offers more than just virus protection
description: TL;DR: An annual subscription to McAfee Total Protection is on sale for £19.99, saving you £40 on list price. An unfortunate result of more people working remotely is an increase in ransomware, viruses, malware, spyware, and unwanted programs. It has never be…
